name: Legend of Dungeon: Masters
description: Interact with Legend of Dungeon Livestreams! Take pity on your friends as they toil in the dungeon, and send them glorious blades, potions, and bazookas.. or don’t! Help or hinder, it’s up to you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory Storage: 500 MB available space
